name: slag
short_description:
Major update! New Admin/Configuration code! Fixed many bugs! 

SLAG is a simple web image album gallery. PHP and optional JavaScript. Supports themes & plugins. So far has two themes based on ZenPhoto; and two extensions, jQuery and NivoSlider. Just throw the code up on the Web.

You will have to create your own images & thumbnails (a few samples provided), and use FTP. But it's easy to get an image/photo size/resize program -- one probably came with your camera! 

Version 1.5.0 11/16/12

I can now honestly declare that this is, in my opinion, pretty good code. The code is small and efficient. It is basically self-configuring. It will work with minimal configuration and the default settings. You can configure locally or remotely.

YOU DO NEED TO SETUP A REMOTE PASSWORD FIRST -- I may fix this.

PLEASE REVIEW THE FILES 'README' AND 'INSTALL' BEFORE INSTALLING.
